title: Novaspace recognizes 2025 Excellence Award winners in satellite connectivity, earth observation and startup challenge at World Space Business Week
summary: Novaspace recognized the 2025 winners of its Annual Excellence Awards and the WSBW Startup Challenge during the World Space Business Week. ICEYE was awarded the Leading EO Business Award for its advancements in SAR technology and commercial growth, but no concrete business deal (acquisition, merger, investment, partnership, or contract) involving ICEYE was described.

entities.name: ICEYE
entities.involvement: Mentioned as winner of the Leading EO Business Award, but not involved in a concrete business deal.

entities.name: MDA
entities.involvement: Winner of the Global Satellite Business Award.

entities.name: SES
entities.involvement: Winner of the Strategic Transaction Award for its merger with Intelsat.

entities.name: Intelsat
entities.involvement: Merged with SES, as referenced in the award.

entities.name: KT SAT
entities.involvement: Winner of the Regional Satellite Business Award.

entities.name: Starlink
entities.involvement: Winner of the Universal Broadband Award.

entities.name: CNES
entities.involvement: Winner of the Sustainable Development & Business Award.

entities.name: OroraTech
entities.involvement: Winner of the New EO Operator Award.

entities.name: Firefly Aerospace
entities.involvement: Winner of the Pioneer Space Business Award.

entities.name: Space Solar
entities.involvement: Recognized for space-based solar power development.
